data.actual_result: There is two odd mention banners, one is at the "Discord home button" one at the "create a server" button
data.expected_result: There should only be one NEW mentions banner pointing to the server you get mentioned in
data.short_description: If you have an unread mention in a server, you'll have two "NEW" banners going two opposite direction, one underneath the create a server button, one above the "Home" button
data.steps_to_repro: - Get mentioned in a server - Observe the two odd "NEW" mentions banners
